column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: Police in Khan Chamkarmon detained a pair of black ------foreign------ men w------ho fought on public roads at 2:30 pm on November 5
column5: at the front of Boeung Keng Kang High School along 392 Street
column7: Khan Chamkar Mon .------District police said that before the local patrol force arrived
column8: people reported------ about five foreigners fighting in the street. Some escaped
column9: but two were arrested and questioned at the police station in ------Boeung Keng Kang 1.------The men spoke English and told police the brawl was over an unpaid debt.------The men have been sent to the Immigration Department to act according to legal procedures.------DAP News
